Title: Memento Mori
Plot: Scully's recent failing health is revealed to be inoperable brain cancer, which is common among abductees. She meets with other abductees with the same condition and forms a special bond with a dying woman, while Mulder tries to save her from a doctor who may be connected with the abductions.
Writer: Chris Carter, Vince Gilligan, John Shiban, Frank Spot
GuestStars: Sean Allen, Julie Bond, David Lovgren, Gillian Barber, Casey Murphy
